landingPage.heroDescription: Learn anytime, anywhere with instant AI guidance. Master any subject through interactive lessons and personalized tracking.
landingPage.featuresDescription: Explore our AI-driven tools that make learning faster, smarter, and more interactive.

features.title: AI Chat & Voice Mode
features.description: Ask questions via text or voice and get instant, step-by-step explanations.

features.title: Personalized Dashboard
features.description: Track your progress, see completed chapters, and get custom study suggestions.

features.title: Subject & Chapter Navigation
features.description: Find topics by class/grade. Each chapter has key concepts, practice, and tips.

accessibility.title: Accessibility Features
accessibility.description: Our platform supports screen readers, voice input, and large-text modes to accommodate diverse learners.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.description: Get started in just a few simple steps to supercharge your learning with AI.

steps.title: Sign Up / Create Profile
steps.description: Use your email or phone to create an account, then set your class or grade level.

steps.title: Select Subjects
steps.description: Choose topics you want to learn, like Math, Science, or Languages.

steps.title: Ask AI or Explore Chapters
steps.description: Use text or voice mode to ask questions, or browse structured lessons.

steps.title: Track Progress & Get Suggestions
steps.description: Monitor your learning stats, see recommended next steps, and stay motivated.

sampleChat.title: Preview a Sample AI Chat
sampleChat.description: See a quick example of RoboGuru in action.
sampleChat.userMessage: Explain the Pythagorean theorem with an example.
sampleChat.aiResponse:
The Pythagorean theorem states that in a right triangle, c² = a² + b².
For example, if a = 3 and b = 4, then c = 5.

community.description: Connect with peers, get tips, and share insights on our discussion forums.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.effectiveDate: Effective Date: January 1, 2025 | Last Updated: January 1, 2025

educationalPurpose.title: Educational Purpose Only
educationalPurpose.description: RoboGuru is an AI-powered educational platform designed to assist students, teachers, and learners with study resources, homework help, and exam preparation.
points: The content, study materials, and AI-generated responses are provided for informational and educational purposes only.
RoboGuru does not replace professional academic guidance from teachers, educators, or subject-matter experts.
While we strive for accuracy, we do not guarantee that all answers, explanations, or solutions are error-free or comprehensive.

noGuarantees.title: No Guarantees & Warranties
noGuarantees.description: RoboGuru is provided 'as is' without any guarantees or warranties, express or implied.
points: We do not guarantee uninterrupted, error-free, or always-available services.
We do not guarantee that our AI-generated solutions are always accurate, complete, or suitable for every academic need.
Users assume full responsibility for how they use the app's content and services.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.description: By using RoboGuru, you agree that:
points: We are not liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, consequential, or special damages arising from the use of the app.
We are not responsible for any incorrect answers, misinterpretations, or any loss incurred due to reliance on RoboGuru’s AI-generated solutions.
We do not endorse any third-party links, content, or advertisements that may appear on the platform.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services & Advertisements
points: RoboGuru may integrate third-party services, APIs, or advertisements to enhance user experience.
We do not control, endorse, or assume responsibility for the content, accuracy, or policies of third-party services.
Users engaging with third-party services do so at their own risk and should review their respective terms and policies.

userResponsibilities.title: User Responsibilities
points: Users are responsible for using RoboGuru ethically and legally.
Any misuse, including unauthorized content distribution, plagiarism, or inappropriate usage, is strictly prohibited and may result in account suspension.
We reserve the right to update or modify this Disclaimer at any time without prior notice. Continued use of the app signifies acceptance of the latest version.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.description: For any concerns, queries, or feedback regarding this Disclaimer, please contact us:

general.address: Address: 123 RoboGuru Lane, AI City, Techland

legal.title: For legal inquiries:
legal.address: Address: 163 - GF Pocket 2, Jasola, New Delhi 1100025

aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.description: Transforming education through AI-driven solutions tailored to every learner's needs.

ourMission.title: Our Mission
ourMission.description: At RoboGuru, our mission is to make education accessible, engaging, and effective for everyone. We aim to empower learners by providing tools that personalize their learning experiences and encourage continuous growth.

ourValues.title: Our Core Values
ourValues.description: A diverse array of learning materials to enhance your educational journey.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Driving advancements in AI and educational technologies to create exceptional learning experiences.

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.description: Making education accessible to all, breaking barriers to ensure no one is left behind.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: Committed to delivering high-quality educational tools, ensuring a superior learning experience.

ourTeam.title: Meet Our Team
ourTeam.description: Our team of passionate educators, AI experts, and technologists is committed to redefining the future of learning.

member1.name: Asly Roe
member1.description: An AI pioneer with 15+ years of experience in education technology.

member2.name: Jane Smith
member2.description: Leads curriculum development with a focus on personalized learning.

member3.name: Michael Brown
member3.description: Oversees product innovation to deliver user-friendly experiences.

termAndCondition.title: Terms and Conditions
termAndCondition.description: Please read these terms and conditions carefully before using RoboGuru.

generalTerms.title: General Terms
points: By using RoboGuru, you agree to comply with these terms and conditions.
RoboGuru reserves the right to update these terms at any time without prior notice.
All content and materials provided by RoboGuru are for personal and educational use only.

userResponsibilities.title: User Responsibilities
points: Users must provide accurate and up-to-date information during registration.
You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials.
Any misuse of the platform, including unauthorized access or distribution of content, is prohibited.

privacyAndSecurity.title: Privacy and Security
points: Your privacy and data security are important to us. Please refer to our Privacy Policy for more details on how we handle your information.

limitationOfLiability.title: Limitation of Liability
points: RoboGuru is not liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from the use of the platform.
The platform is provided 'as is,' without any warranties of any kind, express or implied.
RoboGuru does not guarantee uninterrupted or error-free access to the platform.

governingLaw.title: Governing Law
points: These terms and conditions are governed by the laws of the jurisdiction in which RoboGuru operates.
Any disputes arising from these terms will be resolved in accordance with applicable laws.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.description: Your privacy is important to us. Learn about how we collect, use, and protect your personal data.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: At RoboGuru, we are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains what information we collect, how we use it, and the measures we take to ensure its security.

points.label: Personal Information
points.description: Name, email address, phone number, etc.

points.label: Usage Data
points.description: Information about how you use our platform, including interactions and preferences.

points.label: Device Information
points.description: Device type, operating system, and browser details.

howWeUse.title: How We Use Your Information
howWeUse.intro: We use the information we collect for the following purposes:
points: To provide and improve our services.
To personalize your learning experience.
To communicate with you about updates and new features.
To ensure the security and functionality of our platform.

dataProtection.title: How We Protect Your Data
dataProtection.content: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your personal data from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. This includes encryption, access controls, and regular security audits.

thirdPartySharing.title: Third-Party Sharing
thirdPartySharing.content: We do not sell your personal information to third parties. However, we may share data with trusted partners to improve our services, comply with legal obligations, or protect our users' safety.

contactUs.title: Contact Us
contactUs.intro: If you have any questions or concerns about our Privacy Policy, please contact us at:
